ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Ogres in W. Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: What level are all those guys anyway?  I never thought about trying to lament them, but I m sure that he d resist it. Bill Costlow  on
ygData.messageBody:
What level are all those guys anyway? I never thought about trying to
lament them, but I'm sure that he'd resist it.




Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...> on 05/29/2001 11:02:57 AM

Please respond to eqbards@yahoogroups.com

To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Ogres in W. Karana



Ogre guards may be amiable or indiffernet, but Chief Goonda is not. I
share your pain -- he is an ogre shaman and his pet ran me down, drum,
Selos and all at lvl 16. I never had a chance ...
mike.stone@... wrote:
Hokay..I'm running by, see this temple area with ogres around it..they con
amiable to indifferent, so I cruise up there and WHAMMO. Dead as a
doornail. I was 16th level, and I was dead in less than 2 seconds. Not to
mention I lost my level retrieving my corpse. *sigh*. Now...last I
checked, amiable and indifferent didn't make them want to kill you..or I'd
REALLY be dead in most cities. What's going on w/ that?
